coreAttributes.name: rainbow glove
coreAttributes.description: A pair of brightly-coloured rainbow fingerless gloves, which reach up to wearer's mid-forearm.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the gloves over [npc.her] [npc.hands], before pulling them up to [npc.her] mid-forearm.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the gloves over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.hands], before pulling them up to [npc2.her] mid-forearm.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(forces)] the gloves onto [npc2.namePos] [npc2.hands], before yanking them up to [npc2.her] mid-forearm.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the gloves down from [npc.her] forearms, before pulling them free from [npc.her] [npc.hands].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the gloves down from [npc2.namePos] forearms, before pulling them free from [npc2.her] [npc2.hands].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] the gloves down from [npc2.namePos] forearms, before roughly pulling them free from [npc2.her] [npc2.hands].
